climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 2 PACK PLASTIC FREE PACKAGING & SUSTAINABLE - Our ECOS Laundry Detergent Sheets have 100% plastic-free-packaging making them a sustainable choice for your home; With ECOS dissolvable laundry sheets you can reduce plastic waste with every load

1 LAUNDRY SHEET = 1 LOAD OF DETERGENT - Just toss it in and watch as it instantly dissolves in both hot and cold water; fighting dirt and tough stains while leaving your clothes feeling clean; fresh and residue-free
NO MEASURING; NO MESS - Avoid the mess; the space and the measuring with ECOS; Use 1 sheet for a full load or half for a smaller load; No measuring and nothing to spill

GENTLE ALTERNATIVE - Our clean formula is hypoallergenic and a gentle alternative to traditional liquid detergents and laundry soaps; Made without dyes; optical brighteners; parabens; phosphates or 500+ other nasty ingredients
CLEAN FORMULA WITH VISIBLE RESULTS - Since 1967; ECOS has created safer; powerful cleaning products by using enzymes found in nature
body.description: Sustainable, convenient and wonderfully effective, ECOS Liquidless Laundry Detergent Sheets are the solution you've been looking for! With no plastic packaging, no waste, and no mess, ECOS Plant Powered Sheets make living more sustainably a breeze. ECOS Laundry Detergent Sheets use enzymes found in nature to lift dirt and tough stains without waste. The laundry sheets are 100% dissolvable and the packaging is 100% recyclable. To use, you only need 1 concentrated sheet to power 1 load of laundry. Each sheet contains all the powerful active ingredients of laundry detergent without the water. Simply throw inside your washing machine as you start the wash and the sheet instantly dissolves, helping you reduce plastic consumption to live a more eco-conscious life! Formulated to provide you with amazing results and always dermatologist tested, ECOS dissolvable laundry sheets are plant powered, effective AND hypoallergenic, leaving your clothes looking cleaner and feeling softer than ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-Toxic Freshness all the way around!
reviews.reviewText: he Magnolia & Lily scent is divine! It leaves my clothes smelling fresh and clean without any overpowering or artificial fragrances!!!! What's even more commendable is that this delightful scent is achieved without any toxic ingredients — perfect for those with sensitive skin or allergies.I appreciate that these sheets are hypoallergenic and plant-powered, ensuring that my family's clothes are not only clean but also cared for in the gentlest way possible. With 57 sheets in each pack, the value for money is fantastic, making it a cost-effective choice in the long run. Also, no more messy liquid or worrying about pods that kids or pets could swallow.Overall, ECOS Laundry Detergent Sheets have become a staple in my household. They offer a combination of convenience, eco-friendliness, and effective cleaning power that's hard to beat. I wholeheartedly recommend giving them a try — your clothes, your skin, and our planet will thank you!#EcoFriendly #PlantPowered #CleanLiving 🌿🌸

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love not having large plastic to recycle - Subtle smell
reviews.reviewText: These are great. Throw a sheet in the wash, it disinegrates, cleans well and smells good - but very subtle. I have sensitive skin and this product gives me no issues at all.Gave one box to my mom and she loved it as well!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I was a Tide user for decades but always hated the big plastic containers. These dissolve well and I love the scent. I feel the detergent is just as effective as tide. So much less packaging and smaller space to store. Easier to order on line

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets clothes clean, inexpensive, no scent on clothes
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I'm giving these four stars is that the lavender vanilla scent of the sheets is lovely but there is none of it remaining when clothes come out of the dryer. This may be a plus for some people! I went from a very popular name brand liquid detergent starting with T to powdered detergents in cardboard boxes to reduce my plastic usage, but didn't like the powder residue sometimes still on my clothes. (I have a front load washer by the way.) Saw these and thought they would be perfect for my daughter going to college as they take up very little space, so I started using them as well and I feel they do a great job getting our clothes clean. She works out a lot and has no complaint about her sweaty workout clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best detergent sheets out there
reviews.reviewText: These work well in all temps and do not leave undissolved pieces even in cold water. They are great at removing stains and the unscented have zero scent. Thrilled with my purchase and putting them on subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These accumulate gunk inside washing machine causing a horrible soured smell!
reviews.reviewText: When I discovered these last fall at C o s t c o I was thrilled to not have to deal with big, heavy plastic jugs that took up a lot of space in my laundry room. (Then when I saw them on here in the Unscented I went ahead and ordered a supply while they were in stock so I'd have them). I didn't mind that I had to spend an extra minute to make sure they dissolved completely. I did notice they didn't seem to clean as well as my liquid detergent but I was so happy at the prospect of how much space I was saving that I brushed it off and just added an extra half or sometimes whole sheet depending on how dirty the clothes or how large the load was, like towels....which I noticed never seemed as fresh and clean anymore. But I so wanted to love these that I just kept trying them and making adjustments until one day I noticed that my laundry room smelled a little like soured laundry. By the third day the smell was getting worse, and by the end of that day the smell would knock you over when opening the laundry room door, and was even beginning to make the bathroom and hallway smell. I could tell it was coming from the washer. It took me hours to finally make the connection to the laundry sheets and I wasn't even positive that was the problem (as the dishwasher plastic detergent pods had been with our dishwasher and drain line years before) until I ran the washer full of just hot water & half gallon of bleach once, which only helped a little. Then I ran it full of hot water & 1 gallon of vinegar which I let sit for an hour before running it through the wash/rinse cycle. That almost got rid of the smell completely, so I did that again but added a cap full of Tide liquid, and that finally rid the smell completely, and I'm guessing the gunk buildup as well, because I've had no problems since. And I haven't used these detergent sheets any more either. I definitely do not recommend them.Not that it matters now, but I was not sent the Unscented ones I ordered, but was sent Lavender Vanilla.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: Love these laundry strips. Eco friendly, less waste and gets our clothes super clean. Also great for sensitive skin!

reviews.reviewText: This product works great. Love the scent. Completely dissolves every time at every temperature. Does a good job getting things clean. Happy with this product and will continue to purchase.
